TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
granted now they cant get them right!

i wish it was snowing

(Gee, what a change from the usual!)

Granted. It is snowing. It has always been snowing. It has never not snowed. You were never even wishing that wish, for it has always been snowing. There are things out there, out upon the icy plains, that venture into the cities at night, and devour all that they can find. No one is safe. Not even you.

I wish I had a brick.

What in the name of god was that corruption?!?

Ok, then. A brick appears above your computer, destroying it and landing on your fingers.

I wish that I could solve all riddles.

Granted. The solution offends you massively.

I wish that I could pull off a 360 noscope in KSP.

Granted. Jebidiah then makes the ship crash into the ocean.

I wish for something that cannot go either good or bad, and can never be bad and is a cookie.

Granted. It is a poison cookie, since one must define what is good and what is bad.

I wish for a spaceship that has 100km of delta v, and has no overheating or structural issues.

Granted. You can only go 100km with that amount of Delta-V

I wish for a room with nothing in it but oxygen, and a way out

Granted. The oxygen is combined with carbon to make carbon dioxide, and you suffocate before you can leave.

I wish for a Banhammer.

Granted, but you accidentally hit yourself with it and end up banned.

I wish people would stop fooling around with serious equipment.

Granted, but then people do not use serious equipment, causing a worldwide collapse in the economy due to the serious equipment bubble bursting.

I wish that I aced all of my exams.

Granted, but then people do not use serious equipment, causing a worldwide collapse in the economy due to the serious equipment bubble bursting.

I wish that I aced all of my exams.

granted, your exams count for nothing and leave you jobless and homeless until you die muahahahaha
I wish KSP was more popular.

Granted. Now all of the trolls and ragers are in the community and now it is ruined forever. Good job!

I wish people stopped swearing.

Granted. Now people swear again!!! good job good sir...

I wish i had a Saturn V rocket land at my house.

Granted, it hits with the energy and result of a ICBM strike.

I wish I didn't have to spend so much time trying to make money.

Edited February 4, 2014 by dnulho
ninja'd

Granted. You make no money.

I wish that KSP becomes an online only game with loads of DLC and having to wait real time for ships to be built

Granted. It's already bad!

I wish that Jebediah Kerman was on this Earth!

Granted. Now he flys a Lunar Lander and crashs into your house...

I wish I had 10 copys Of KSP...

Granted. They are all horribly corrupted.

I wish the next poster died right after saying "Granted, but-"

Edited February 5, 2014 by Souper

Granted, but- *dies*

*wakes up*

Sorry. I'm immortal.

I wish people would stop trying to kill me.

Granted, but you grow tired of life and try to kill yourself, only to realize you can't die. You spend the rest of your life in endless torment.

I wish The Kraken was dead, and Jeb to blow vexx's head off in a futile attempt to kill him.

Edited February 5, 2014 by Souper

Sigh, looks like I need to add a rule... "One wish at a time..." Let's make this a little more interesting.

Granted, but the Kraken is immortal, and the Kraken wakes up again just in time to dismember Jeb before he can attempt to kill me.

I wish I had a perfect score on Flappy Bird.

Granted. You are banned for hacking.

I wish for hax.

Granted. You hack at a tree with an ax.

I wish I had a stable wormhole.

Granted. You now have a VERY unstable wormhole that looks like a horse stable.

I wish.
